tool.name: SpectraFilterParentPeakMower
tool.command:
SpectraFilterParentPeakMower
#if $param_in: -in $param_in #end if #if $param_out: -out $param_out #end if #if $param_algorithm_window_size: -algorithm:window_size $param_algorithm_window_size #end if #if $param_algorithm_default_charge: -algorithm:default_charge $param_algorithm_default_charge #end if #if $param_algorithm_consider_NH3_loss: -algorithm:consider_NH3_loss $param_algorithm_consider_NH3_loss #end if #if $param_algorithm_consider_H2O_loss: -algorithm:consider_H2O_loss $param_algorithm_consider_H2O_loss #end if #if $adv_opts.adv_opts_selector=='advanced': #if $adv_opts.param_force: -force #end if #if $adv_opts.param_algorithm_clean_all_charge_states: -algorithm:clean_all_charge_states $adv_opts.param_algorithm_clean_all_charge_states #end if #if $adv_opts.param_algorithm_reduce_by_factor: -algorithm:reduce_by_factor $adv_opts.param_algorithm_reduce_by_factor #end if #if $adv_opts.param_algorithm_factor: -algorithm:factor $adv_opts.param_algorithm_factor #end if #if $adv_opts.param_algorithm_set_to_zero: -algorithm:set_to_zero $adv_opts.param_algorithm_set_to_zero #end if #end if

param.name: param_algorithm_window_size
param.label: The size of the m/z window where the peaks are removed, +/- window_size

param.name: param_algorithm_default_charge
param.label: If the precursor has no charge set, the default charge is assumed

param.name: param_algorithm_consider_NH3_loss
param.label: Whether NH3 loss peaks from the precursor should be removed

param.name: param_algorithm_consider_H2O_loss
param.label: Whether H2O loss peaks from the precursor should be removed

param.name: param_algorithm_clean_all_charge_states
param.label: Set to 1 if precursor ions of all possible charge states should be removed

param.name: param_algorithm_reduce_by_factor
param.label: Reduce the intensities of the precursor and related ions by a given factor (set 'set_to_zero' to 0)

param.name: param_algorithm_factor
param.label: Factor which is used to reduce the intensities if 'reduce_by_factor' is selected

param.name: param_algorithm_set_to_zero
param.label: Reduce the intensities of the precursor and related ions to zero

tool.help:
Applies thresholdfilter to peak spectra.
For more information, visit http://ftp.mi.fu-berlin.de/OpenMS/release-documentation/html/TOPP_SpectraFilterParentPeakMower.html
